attr.title: Sword of Jade
attr.desc: A lengthy fantasy adventure role playing game based around a day/night cycle, customizing your heroes, and a storyline where every choice has an impact on the story.  A retro-inspired RPG built with the OHRRPGCE engine, blending modern mechanics with Super Nintendo-era style.
attr.inst: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to FyreWulff Software for giving us permission to Share the original game.
